dates.note: Notes taken during July 2024 evaluation. Record written as one final assessment of the bottled product.

whisky.name_display: Errol Wings 12 Year Old Blended Scotch whisky

tasting.summary: Pale gold. A clean, fresh nose with lemon-sherbet lift and a hint of milk chocolate. Creamy texture. Fresh, sweet start becoming very lightly acidic, then a vigorous feel with more body and a touch of spice. Pleasant and easy to drink.

nose: Mellow nose-feel with very light prickle
Developing a hint of milk chocolate
palate: Fresh taste starting sweet, becoming very lightly acidic
Vigorous feel with more body and some spice
overall: Easy drinking with a vigorous feel

context.note: Original work included several caramel trials; this record reflects the bottled product only.

source.original_text: Errol Wings 12YO @40% ABV. Clean, fresh aroma with lemon-sherbet lift and milk-chocolate hint. Creamy texture. Fresh taste, sweet then very lightly acidic. Bottled product shows a vigorous feel with more body and some spice. Pleasant and easy to drink.
